metadata.title: RHSA-2018:1713: unboundid-ldapsdk security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
The UnboundID LDAP SDK for Java is a free Java library for communicating with LDAP directory servers and performing related tasks like reading and writing LDIF, encoding and decoding data using base64 and ASN.1 BER, and performing secure communications.

The following packages have been upgraded to a later upstream version: unboundid-ldapsdk (4.0.5). (BZ#1558308)

Security Fix(es):

* unboundid-ldapsdk: Incorrect Access Control vulnerability in process function in SimpleBindRequest class (CVE-2018-1000134)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: unboundid-ldapsdk: Incorrect Access Control vulnerability in process function in SimpleBindRequest class

criterions.comment: unboundid-ldapsdk is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
unboundid-ldapsdk-javadoc is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
